alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 9:05AM AKST until January 27 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta south of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.
